If you want to get up to speed with #ggplot2 and its extended universe of packages I've released free recordings of my "Plotting Anything with ggplot2" workshop. Have fun! #rstats 

https://t.co/LxwwSsESQM

https://t.co/uZda0KRAgp

~4.5h of video so find a comfy chairüôÇ

Really excited that https://t.co/VV8S7GkE9H is now publicly available ‚Äî among other things it provides Linux binaries for CRAN packages, which makes install so so much faster. Learn more at https://t.co/zId043OT7x #rstats

I was getting lost in all my bookmarks of all the amazing #rstats resources being shared as blog posts, Twitter threads, and GitHub repos. So I made a simple website to compile all the free resources that I am aware of. Check out https://t.co/hnqhBOZneG

Our recent work w/ @pat_nikos, mapping the largest internal #migration flows across 38 countries in #Europe using @Mapbox in #rstats. Link to reproducible #code & #data https://t.co/Qcpn3XUFTO & our @cpos_journal paper which explains the observed patterns https://t.co/Icy03Ob0U0 https://t.co/6R7LXY90DF
